text: David Cronenberg (born March 15, 1943) is a Canadian director, producer, screenwriter and actor. He was born in Toronto, Ontario. He is of Jewish descent. Genre of his films is body horror. Many of them are considered classic of this genre. Cronenberg's work includes: Rabid, The Brood, Scanners, Videodrome, The Fly, Dead Ringers, Crash, A History of Violence, Eastern Promises and A Dangerous Method. == Other websites == * Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Toronto Category:Canadian Jews Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian movie directors Category:Canadian movie producers Category:Canadian screenwriters Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian television directors Category:Cinematographers Category:Jewish actors Category:Jewish businesspeople Category:Movie editors
title: David Cronenberg
